availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Samuels (Magoffin County, Kentucky, store clerk)

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, store clerk. Virginia native. Married to Marly R. Gardner in Magoffin County on March 24, 1861. Father of B. F. Samuels. Store clerk in Magoffin County in 1860. Residing in the house of B. F. Gardner in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Licking Station, p. 65.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, Mount Sterling, p. 308B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Magoffin County Marriages, Film #000988583, pp. 2-3.
Find A Grave, "John Samuels (1839-1893)," Memorial #84924742, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84924742 (accessed May 17, 2020).
